score.description: Binary score: 1 if deficiency exists AND caused failure, else 0.

deficiency_exists.description: Does a formation deficiency exist in the benchmark, regardless of causation?

deficiency_caused_failure.description: Did the identified deficiency cause this specific failure?

deficiency_type.description: Brief label for the type of deficiency if one exists, or 'none'.

existence_reasoning.description: Analysis of whether and what deficiency exists in the benchmark.

causation_reasoning.description: Analysis of whether the deficiency caused the failure, or what else caused it.

evidence.description: Specific quotes or references from the trace supporting the conclusion.
